channel.title: I need help with the coordinates for shops, npcs, and portals
channel.description:
ok i need help with finding a way to make pking out of the usual way, like in ocean, or somewhere no one knows=) PLus i need help making my own shops, if anyone can just talk to me and tell me what to do without getting annoyed to fast. And some portals wouldn't kill anyone , i just need help...Thank you!
O and i am recruiting members for runescape0, network pass 123, on hamachi only=) I want this to be a really great server , where everyone can enjoy themselves, it should be like real runescape, just with a little twist.!
